entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
